fields.request: Manual QA: Verify nginx 404 page shows autoreloading helper
fields.request_details: Run ./nginx-setup.sh on a staging host so the config refreshes, then stop the Django service (or block the upstream port) and visit /this-page-does-not-exist/ over HTTP and HTTPS. Confirm the Arthexis not-found page appears with the red status chip, retry progress bar, and that the browser automatically reloads every ~15 seconds. Restart the application afterwards.
